string[]: sm get { functionGroupInfo | functionGroupList }, Get the function groups name or states name.
sm query < functionGroupName >,                   Query the function group state.
sm request < functionGroupName > < stateName >,   Set the function group state, which returns the set result.
sm reset { soft | hard } { 0 | 1 },               Reset the MDC system with different actionType(soft/hard) and actionTime(0/1).
sm query_platform_state,                          Query the platform state.
sm request_platform_state <platformState> <params>,     Request the platform state.
sm reset_recovery_count,                          Reset the recovery count to zero.
